name: WKInterfaceObjectVerticalAlignment
desc: Constants for vertically aligning objects in their container.

items.name: case top
items.desc: Top alignment. The object’s content aligns with the top edge of the container and extends downward.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Center alignment. The object’s content is centered vertically in the container and extends equally up and down.

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: Bottom alignment. The object’s content aligns with the bottom edge of the container and extends upward.
